attributes.action: Having no confidence in the government, we demand a general election immediately
attributes.additional_details: We the electorate have no confidence in the present government, which cannot command a majority in parliament and therefore cannot function as a working government any longer. We demand an immediate general election, to break the deadlock in parliament and give power back to the electorate.
attributes.background: Given that the government cannot command a majority in parliament, we the electorate demand a general election be called immediately, to allow a functioning government to be installed by the people and break the deadlock in parliament giving power back to the electorate.
